content: this is a summary of a legal case in slovenia where the supreme court made a decision on september 26 2019 the case involves a married couple whose marriage was dissolved in 2001 the court determined that they coowned several properties and investments including parcels of land residential premises and other assets the court determined the applicants share in these properties and ordered the defendant to pay a specific amount of money along with interest the court also addressed the division of other assets such as works of art paintings and motor vehicles the court dismissed some appeals and upheld others making corrections to the judgment the court also discussed the registration of immovable properties and rejected an application for land registration permits the applicant requested a revision of the lower courts decision but the court found it inadmissible and dismissed it the court ruled on the costs of the review

metadata.CASE_ID: Sodba Vrhovnega sodišča RS II Ips 232/2018, 26. 9. 2019
